subject: Re: Eclipse is closed automatically when tried to add Junit
msgSnippet: ... A wild guess ?  In Windows Explorer, there is the Option: [ ] Hide file extensions for known file types If that option was checked metadata.log  might
messageBody:
> I have Eclipse 3.1 installed in my windows XP PC.
:
:
> 1. I do not find the file $yourworkspace/.metadata/.log
> I could see .metadata file but not .log file

A 'wild guess'? In Windows Explorer, there is the Option:
[ ] Hide file extensions for known file types
If that option was checked metadata.log might appear: metadata


Clark Anderson
